title: How to stop dating bad boys
text:

When it comes to your dating history, you feel you could create a veritable Hall of Shame with all the abominable characters you have met so far in your journey of love and romance. It's like you cannot help but feel an almost inexorable attraction towards 'bad boys' who eventually dash your hopes for a meaningful relationship. Well, if you want to break the pattern, here's what you can do:As the cliche goes, don't judge a book by its cover. In other words, if you are simply falling for good looks, overlooking all that's beneath the beautiful exterior, it's time you realise that you should get attracted to a person, not an idealised image.Compatibility is. So, take your time and check if the person you are dating is compatible with you. In other words, you should be sharing a lot of common interests with him. Otherwise sustaining the relationship could be an uphill task.Watch out for the red flags. Don't be naive and don't buy all the bullsh*t that he might be dishing out. Learn to spot the lies and other irregularities in his behaviour.Don't rush into a tempestuous romance. If necessary, put your dating plans on a slow burn. Wait-and-watch will always be a prudent approach.
description: If you feel inexorably attracted to bad boys, who eventually dash your hopes for a meaningful relationship, here's what you need to do.
